articles.title: Covid-19 will end in mid-Sept in India, say Health Min officials - കേരള കൌമുദി
articles.description: NEW DELHI: When will the coronavirus pandemic end in India? There is no definite answer yet, but senior officials of the Health Ministry predict that the pandemic in India may go in mid-September this year.
